Exercise 1.

var myString = 'Rutvij';
var myNumber = 892024878;
var myBoolean = true;

// Do not edit the code under this line
console.log("Name: " + myString);
console.log("Lucky Number: " + myNumber);
console.log("Good joke? " + myBoolean);

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Exercise 2

console.log('Cheese','Chicken');

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Exercise 3

console.log(18+3.5);
console.log(2016-1969);
console.log(65/240);
console.log(0.2708333333333333*100);
